short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The simplest & to the point Minecraft recipe book!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
CraftBook is a simple Minecraft Chrome extension that helps you find the crafting recipe of whatever item you want. The crafting tutorials are simple & show you how to get the materials to craft your item.
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Version: 0.1 Beta
Support Email: hypeblockyt@gmail.com
